channel.title: Adding a Regular Prayer Book Command
channel.description: Hi i made a curses command and when you switch back it makes you pay 200 pk points and im wanting to make it to where when they type like ::regular it switches to the regular prayer book without needing anything.

item.title: Adding a Regular Prayer Book Command
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Try this first? I tried making it delete 200 only if they switched to curses. So, going to normal should be free.

Let me know how it works.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("curses")) { if (c.pkPoints > 199) { c.pkPoints -= ((c.altarPrayed == 0) ? 200 : 0); c.altarPrayed = (c.altarPrayed == 0) ? 1 : 0; c.setSidebarInterface(5, ((c.altarPrayed == 0) ? 5608 : 22500)); c.sendMessage("You lose 200 pk points for switching your curses."); } else { c.sendMessage("You need at least 200 pk points to do this."); return; } }[/quote]
Thank You I Vain I for all your help they both work i really appreciate all your help.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding a Regular Prayer Book Command

item.title: Adding a Regular Prayer Book Command
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

if you know where you found the curses book id then find the prayer book, it should be easy after that if you have the code. Or post the code on here with the id and somebody will try to help.
